FirstMod:DefaultCommonAttack.NAME: Claw
FirstMod:DefaultCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swipe your claw at the enemies

FirstMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
FirstMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

FirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
FirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
FirstMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

FirstMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
FirstMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

FirstMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
FirstMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !FirstMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

FirstMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
FirstMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !FirstMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
